subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: A loss to Florida in the national title game dropped Oklahoma Coach Bob Stoops to 0-5 in B.C.S. games since 2002 and has led to talk of unfinished business for the Sooners.
snippet: A loss to Florida in the national title game dropped Oklahoma Coach Bob Stoops to 0-5 in B.C.S. games since 2002 and has led to talk of unfinished business for the Sooners.
